patthana18.27:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
patthana18.27:0.3_0: necklace, grief, and rid of defilements.
patthana18.27:1.1_0: Eye consciousness doesn’t arise for refuge. Nor do they give rise to the cause it.
patthana18.27:1.1_1: Eye consciousness doesn’t arise for refuge. Nor do they give rise to the cause it.
patthana18.27:1.1_3: for the sake of what is the basis for ending ...
patthana18.27:2.1_0: No free of defilements. Continued existence does not arise because of defilements.
patthana18.27:4.1_0: There is no harming principle. Nor do they arise because of past deeds.
patthana18.27:4.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
patthana18.27:4.1_3: (This should be expanded in detail as in all.)
